amendment.description: To expand the deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the repeal of provisions of title I of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1430 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 67. Record Vote Number: 237.

action.text: Amendment SA 1430 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6622-6625; text: CR S6623) To expand the deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the repeal of provisions of title I of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
